title: NETWORK_CLAN_GET_MEMBERSHIP
content:
0xC8BC2011F67B34110xCDC4A590// NetworkClanGetMembership
BOOL NETWORK_CLAN_GET_MEMBERSHIP(int* networkHandle, int* clanMembership, int membershipIndex);Parameters:networkHandle: A player network handle.clanMembership: Output buffer for the membership data. Also known as "desc".membershipIndex: If the player has multiple crews/memberships, use [0-9], or -1 to get the active crew/membership.Returns: Returns true on success, false otherwise.Retrieves a membership for a player, from the cache (i.e. downloaded via NETWORK_CLAN_DOWNLOAD_MEMBERSHIP).Test C++ code:
https://pastebin.com/CD8wni4C
codeBlocks:
// NetworkClanGetMembership
